body.name: EnzZone Travel Iron with Dual Voltage - 100V/240V Lightweight Dry Portable Iron for Clothes, Non-Stick Soleplate, 3 Heat Settings 345℉, Mini Craft Iron, Spray Bottle & Drawstring Bag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 46 mins
features: 100-240V DUAL VOLTAGE, Ideal for Travel. The mini iron for clothes is designed with a dual-voltage switch, which allows you to bring it anywhere worldwide. Removes wrinkles from almost any fabric. For traveling abroad, just select between 100 and 240 volts.
TRAVEL SIZE IRON being only 6" x 3" x 1.5" making it the perfect size when traveling with just carry on luggage. Small enough to fit inside your handbag or coat pocket.
MINI TRAVEL IRON weighing only 350grams includes a drawstring bag and plastic spray bottle.
CRAFT IRON for iron on transfers with Detachable Handle that acts as a holder for the small travel iron for compact storage.
NON-STICK SOLEPLATE dry iron for ease of ironing with 3 temperature settings for a wide range of fabrics. This small iron heats upto 345℉ (174℃)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mini Travel Iron and Craft Iron: Your Ultimate Travel and Crafting Companions Discover the perfect tools for those who demand unwavering style and wrinkle-free confidence on their journeys, as well as the precision needed for crafting with iron-on badges and transfers. The Mini Travel Iron and Craft Iron, with their exceptional features, are your passports to a wrinkle-free world and stunning DIY creations.

Compact and Convenient: Designed for jet-setters and globetrotters, this portable handheld mini iron is not just compact; it's exceptionally convenient. With a detachable handle that cleverly doubles as a storage solution for the iron body, it's the epitome of travel-ready design. No more lugging around oversized, cumbersome irons – our Mini Travel Iron is tailored to meet your travel needs. Carry On Luggage: Say goodbye to the frustration of wrinkled clothes while traveling. Elevate your travel experience with the Mini Travel Iron – a compact, convenient, and efficient solution to ensure you always look your best. Whether you're on a business trip, a romantic getaway, or a globetrotting adventure, this mini iron is the answer to wrinkles and fashion dilemmas. Compact, efficient, and ready to go wherever you are. Wrinkle-free travel has never been this easy. Dual Voltage for Worldwide Use: Worried about international travel? Don't be. The Mini Travel Iron is built with dual voltage compatibility, making it your trusted companion around the globe.

Tailored Heat Control: With three temperature control dial settings, you have the power to adjust the heat precisely to match your fabric. Whether it's a silk blouse or a cotton shirt, this iron ensures your clothes get the tailored treatment they deserve. Rapid Heat, Effortless Ironing: Our Quick-Heat Technology is your time-saver. In a matter of moments, the Mini Travel Iron heats up to 345℉ (174℃), ready to smooth out wrinkles in no time.
Nonstick Teflon Soleplate: The Craft Iron features a nonstick soleplate, offering an exceptionally smooth glide and making it perfect for working on various craft materials.
DIMENSIONS 6" x 2.75" x 1.5" TEMPERATURE 345℉ (174℃) WEIGHT 0.784lb INCLUSION 1 X Water Spray Bottle and 1 x Travel Carry Bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini Travel Iron
reviews.reviewText: After purchasing several other travel irons (none of which were worth keeping), this is the one! Great size & weight. Works like a regular sized iron. It has more than one heat setting. Heats up to a temperature that tackles wrinkles on a cotton shirt! Easy to assemble and disassemble. Comfortable to use. Very nice tote bag to use for travel or storage of the iron. Highly recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST HAVE!!!
reviews.reviewText: The EnzZone Mini Travel Iron makes life a little bit easier when taking a trip or just having to be on the road for longer than usual. It is very small and light weight but sure gets the job done. The iron heats quickly and just as quickly removes wrinkles from fabric. Because of its size it is easy to store, and it is practically unnoticeable in your luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: This iron does NOT get hot. It's not heavy enough to do anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enzone travel iron
reviews.reviewText: This iron is so handy!! Not to mention adorable!! The fact that it takes up very little space and is pretty much flat when storing it away makes it perfect for traveling, it will take up very little room in a suitcase or overnight bag. It was very effective at getting the wrinkles out of my t shirt that I left in the laundry basket too long lol. They price point is fair for the quality and convenience of the iron. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small iron, big helper!
reviews.reviewText: This iron is nice because it heats up quickly and packs a lot of heating power into a small package! It’s space-saving, works great, and easy to use for travel and at home. I like that it lays down flat in my suitcase or a cabinet for easy travel and storage, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This little travel iron is lightweight and compact, but does the job so well! Comes with a little mist bottle and a nice quality canvas bag. I used it to iron a linen shirt on the highest setting and it was perfect. Cord is 4.5" long, the non-stick plate is 5" long. Honestly this would make an awesome gift!
